authors.name: David  C
authors.affiliation: Department of Clinical and Movement Neurosciences, Queen Square Institute of Neurology, University College London, University of London

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5npsg","text":"Fibroblasts are cultured in Dulbecco’s modified eagle media (DMEM) 4500 (mg/L) growth medium supplemented with Glutamax (Gibco), 10% foetal bovine serum (FBS), non-essential amino acids (NEAA: 0.1 mM of: glycine, L-alanine, L-asparagine, L-aspartic acid, L-glutamic acid, L-proline and L-serine) and penicillin/streptomycin antibiotic cocktail (50ng/ml) at 37°C and 5% CO2. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":371,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ch6bk","text":"Characteristics","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"delll","text":"Obtained /developed from human adult dermal biopsies","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqce7","text":"Proliferative until p20","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s99v","text":"Doubling time ~ 24h","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3te7c","text":"Maintain between 60 – 90% confluent","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c0llf","text":"DMEM (LT      # 61965-059; 4500 mg/L and no pyruvate) Glutamax medium","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ecv1","text":"Fetal      bovine serum (FBS, 10% final) – 1 / 10 dilution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7e3m","text":"Pen / Strep     (LT # 15140-122, 50 U/ml and 50 ng/ml final) -- 1      / 200 dilution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98t58","text":"MEM / NEAA     (LT # 11140-035) -- 1 / 100 dilution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6hrl","text":"As      required -- Sodium pyruvate (Sigma #      S8636, 1 mM final) – 1 / 100 dilution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e9qe","text":"As      required -- Uridine (Sigma # U3003,      stock of 25 mg/ml in H2O filter-sterilised; 50 ug/ml final) – 1 / 500 dilution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjip4","text":"As      required, as permitted by DSO -- Fungizone     (LT # 15290-026; original of 250 ug/ml) – 1 /      100 dilution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"593m9","text":"Wash cells      grown onto 10 cm Ø plate with PBS.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eirpq","text":"Add 1.5      ml diluted trypsin (4 ml of 2.5%, LT #      15090-046, into 100 ml Versene LT #      15040-033) and leave at 37’C for several mins.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai3o6","text":"Tap      the plates and add 2 ml complete medium to stop trypsination.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcvt9","text":"To a      50 ul sample, add equal vol of 0.4% Trypan blue (Sigma # T8154 or LT #      15250-061); fed it to a hemacytometer.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d2g3","text":"Optional      -- to pellet cells and resuspend into fresh medium.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbam5","text":"Replate      the cells accordingly; typically 10 ml medium is used for 10 cm Ø plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajo1l","text":"Subcultivation      ratio of 1:4 is recommended; medium renewal every 2-3d.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cor99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cr1g5","text":"1.After centrifugation to pellet cells, resuspend in Freezing medium (90% FBS / 10% DMSO filter sterilised) and aliquot into freezing vials; typically ¼ of a 50% confluent 10 cm Ø plate of 125K cells in 0.5ml.Freeze cells in a stepwise fashion from -80’C to liq N.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sf0k","text":"2.Thaw cells at 37’C.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Human fibroblast culturing
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"7fv68","text":"SAFETY:-","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68m8r","text":"Biological Hazards:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v9l1","text":"·The culturing of human cells is a class II activity and all appropriate safety issues need to be addressed. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ala6n","text":"·If using GMOs read the Laboratory Codes of practice for working with GMOs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ut8k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
